Content.En: Urgent! Spiky hair! You know? The one with a hair style like a hedgehog!
Content.Cn: 十万火急!刺刺头!你知道吧!发型像刺猬的那个!

Content.En: We agreed to have a gang gathering! He disappeared at such an important occasion!
Content.Cn: 说好了帮派聚会!这么重要的场合他竟然玩失踪!

Content.En: Something big almost happened, you know?
I want him to get out of the gang!
First find out why he doesn't come!
Content.Cn: 先弄清楚他为什么放鸽子!

Content.En: What could be more important than friends? I don't believe it!
Content.Cn: 到底有什么事能比朋友还重要!我不信!
